SELECT A.CUSTNO, A.CUSTNAME, A.DEPTNAME, A.DUTY , CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH( CONCAT(IFNULL(A.MOBILE1,''),IFNULL(A.MOBILE2,''),IFNULL(A.MOBILE3,'')) ) > 8 THEN CONCAT( IFNULL(A.MOBILE1,''),'-',IFNULL(A.MOBILE2,''),'-',IFNULL(A.MOBILE3,'') ) ELSE CONCAT( IFNULL(A.MOBILE1,''),IFNULL(A.MOBILE2,''),IFNULL(A.MOBILE3,'') ) END AS MOBILE_ ,A.MOBILE1,A.MOBILE2,A.MOBILE3 ,A.EMAIL , CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH( CONCAT(IFNULL(A.WRKTEL1,''),IFNULL(A.WRKTEL2,''),IFNULL(A.WRKTEL3,'')) ) > 8 THEN CONCAT( IFNULL(A.WRKTEL1,''),'-',IFNULL(A.WRKTEL2,''),'-',IFNULL(A.WRKTEL3,'') ) ELSE CONCAT( IFNULL(A.WRKTEL1,''),IFNULL(A.WRKTEL2,''),IFNULL(A.WRKTEL3,'') ) END AS WRKTEL_ ,A.WRKTEL1,A.WRKTEL2,A.WRKTEL3 , CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH( CONCAT(IFNULL(A.WRKFAX1,''),IFNULL(A.WRKFAX2,''),IFNULL(A.WRKFAX3,'')) ) > 8 THEN CONCAT( IFNULL(A.WRKFAX1,''),'-',IFNULL(A.WRKFAX2,''),'-',IFNULL(A.WRKFAX3,'') ) ELSE CONCAT( IFNULL(A.WRKFAX1,''),IFNULL(A.WRKFAX2,''),IFNULL(A.WRKFAX3,'') ) END AS WRKFAX_ ,A.WRKFAX1,A.WRKFAX2,A.WRKFAX3 ,A.WRKURL ,A.WRKADDR1, A.WRKADDR2, A.WRKADDR3 ,A.OWNER, B.USERNAME AS OWNER_ , CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH( CONCAT(IFNULL(A.HOMTEL1,''),IFNULL(A.HOMTEL2,''),IFNULL(A.HOMTEL3,'')) ) > 8 THEN CONCAT( IFNULL(A.HOMTEL1,''),'-',IFNULL(A.HOMTEL2,''),'-',IFNULL(A.HOMTEL3,'') ) ELSE CONCAT( IFNULL(A.HOMTEL1,''),IFNULL(A.HOMTEL2,''),IFNULL(A.HOMTEL3,'') ) END AS HOMTEL_ ,A.HOMTEL1,A.HOMTEL2,A.HOMTEL3 ,A.SEX ,A.BIRTH ,A.MARRIED ,A.MAILTO ,A.SOLAR ,A.WEDDINGDAY ,A.CUSTGRADE ,A.JOB ,A.HOBBY ,A.CUSTGUBUN ,A.ACTGRADE ,A.HOMADDR1, A.HOMADDR2, A.HOMADDR3 ,CONCAT(A.HOMADDR1 , A.HOMADDR2 , A.HOMADDR3) AS HOMADDR ,A.HOMADDR1, A.HOMADDR2, A.HOMADDR3 ,A.MEMO ,A.INFOAGREE ,C.DENYMAILAD,C.DENYMAILNEWS ,C.DENYMAILSEMINAR, C.DENYMAILNOMAL, C.DENYMAILSURVEY ,C.DENYSMSNOMAL,C.DENYSMSSEMINAR,C.DENYSMSAD, C.DENYSMSSURVEY ,C.DENYDMNEWS ,C.DENYDMSEMINAR,C.DENYDMAD, C.DENYDMNOMAL, C.DENYDMSURVEY ,C.DENYTELNEWS ,C.DENYTELSEMINAR ,C.DENYFAX ,C.DENYVISIT ,A.CLINO,D.CLINAME ,A.RELCUSTNO
, (SELECT SELF.CUSTNAME FROM CU100010 SELF WHERE SELF.CUSTNO = A.RELCUSTNO) AS RELCUSTNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CU120010 B WHERE B.CUSTNO = A.CUSTNO AND B.ISDELETE = 0) AS BLACKCNT
FROM cu100010 A LEFT OUTER JOIN me800010 B ON A.OWNER = B.USERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN CU100080 C on A.CUSTNO = C.CUSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN sa200010 D ON A.CLINO = D.CLINO
WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.CUSTNO = #{custno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sa280010 (SITEID, CUSTNO, CLINO, REGDATE,EDTDATE, REGUSER,EDTUSER,ISDELETE ) VALUES (#{siteid}, #{custno}, #{clino}, now(), now(), #{reguser}, #{reguser}, 0 ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CLINO = #{clino}, SITEID = #{siteid}, CUSTNO = #{custno}, EDTUSER = #{reguser}, EDTDATE = now()
